name: Molten Walkers
description: You ignite the very ground you step on.

name: The Final March
description: "Each step bears the weight of a thousand soldiers who lost their lives to Chthonian Forces."

name: Windborne Greaves
description: Surrounds you with a blistering wind that chills your enemies to the bone.

name: Boots of Unseeing Swiftness
description: "These boots appear to be of a make and material unlike any of this world."

name: Stonewrought Groundbreakers
description: The enchanted sole of these boots smashes into the ground, unleashing a shockwave that staggers nearby foes.

name: Turin`s Step
description: "Turin, Shieldbreaker of Ikon, took his final bloodied steps bearing these boots in the service of Empyrion."

name: Rifthound Leather Boots
description: "Good for nothing beasts, but they make great boots."

name: Deadwalker Footpads
description: "It is uncertain whether the bones attached to these boots belong to beast...or man."

name: Desecrator Treads
description: "In the wake of unfathomable odds, leave nought but a trail of desecration."

name: Empowered Turin`s Step
description: "Turin, Shieldbreaker of Ikon, took his final bloodied steps bearing these boots in the service of Empyrion."

name: Hellion Greaves
description: Create a burst of hellish flames around you, incinerating nearby enemies.

name: Empowered Final March
description: "Each step bears the weight of a thousand soldiers who lost their lives to Chthonian Forces."

name: Empowered Molten Walkers
description: You ignite the very ground you step on.

name: Empowered Stonewrought Groundbreakers
description: The enchanted sole of these boots smashes into the ground, unleashing a shockwave that staggers nearby foes.

name: Empowered Boots of Unseeing Swiftness
description: "These boots appear to be of a make and material unlike any of this world."

name: Empowered Windborne Greaves
description: Surrounds you with a blistering wind that chills your enemies to the bone.

name: Empowered Rifthound Leather Boots
description: "Good for nothing beasts, but they make great boots."

name: Mythical Desecrator Treads
description: "In the wake of unfathomable odds, leave nought but a trail of desecration."

name: Mythical Final March
description: "Each step bears the weight of a thousand soldiers who lost their lives to Chthonian Forces."

name: Mythical Turin`s Step
description: "Turin, Shieldbreaker of Ikon, took his final bloodied steps bearing these boots in the service of Empyrion."

name: Mythical Deadwalker Footpads
description: "It is uncertain whether the bones attached to these boots belong to beast...or man."

name: Mythical Molten Walkers
description: You ignite the very ground you step on.

name: Mythical Rifthound Leather Boots
description: "Good for nothing beasts, but they make great boots."

name: Mythical Stonewrought Groundbreakers
description: The enchanted sole of these boots smashes into the ground, unleashing a shockwave that staggers nearby foes.

name: Mythical Windborne Greaves
description: Surrounds you with a blistering wind that chills your enemies to the bone.

name: Stormstep Footguards
description: Releases a concentrated burst of static energy which passes through foes.

name: Boots of Primordial Rage
description: A blaze of pure arcane fire erupts beneath your foes.

name: Fiendflesh Greaves
description: The flesh of the fiend protects you from harm.

name: Golemborn Greaves
description: Your flesh becomes as stone, nearly impervious to physical attacks.

name: Timewarped Walkers
description: "Legend goes that these boots can transcend the infinite timelines, but nobody has yet figured out how to harness this power."

name: Venomspine Greaves
description: "The spines drip with the venom of several different species of spider and snake."

name: Wyrmscale Footguards
description: "Acquiring Wyrmscale is so dangerous few can manage to even afford a scrap, nevermind an actual piece of armor. These boots were likely a status symbol for a wealthy noble."

name: Boneshatter Treads
description: "Built with a heavy sole to maximize the sickening crunch of snapping bones."

name: Stonetreaders
description: The enchantment upon these boots shields you from physical harm.

name: Voidwalker Footpads
description: You are resistant to the corrupting effects of the void, putting up a barrier whenever struck by vile fiends that use such magic.

name: Wraithwalkers
description: You step through the veil to become like the dead, barely perceiving the physical realm around you.

name: Amatok`s Step
description: "Blessed upon a frozen peak when Amatok`s star was visible in the night sky."

name: Deathwalker`s Grace
description: You are resistant to the call of death, putting up a barrier whenever struck by abilities that seek to drain you of life`s essence.

name: Earthshatter Treads
description: "The very earth boils and cracks beneath these boots."

name: Footpads of the Grey Magi
description: Sometimes the best way to survive is to run. With a boost of adrenaline, you distance yourself from your enemies.

name: Greaves of Ill Omens
description: The mere presence of a Necromancer is often enough to inspire terror within their enemies. You unleash a ghostly wail upon your target that shatters the confidence of lesser foes and rapidly spreads confusion and fear amongst your enemies.

name: Runeguard Greaves
description: The runes inscribed upon the greaves shield you from arcane harm.

name: Stormtitan Treads
description: You become suffused with lightning, shocking all who stand too close to your presence.

name: Windshear Greaves
description: You become like the wind, swift and difficult to pinpoint.

name: Mythical Boots of Primordial Rage
description: A blaze of pure arcane fire erupts beneath your foes.

name: Mythical Fiendflesh Greaves
description: The flesh of the fiend protects you from harm.

name: Mythical Golemborn Greaves
description: Your flesh becomes as stone, nearly impervious to physical attacks.

name: Mythical Timewarped Walkers

name: Galewind Treads
description: Surrounds you with a blistering wind that chills your enemies to the bone.

name: Krieg`s Boots
description: Stomp the ground with Krieg`s unquenchable wrath.

name: Morgoneth`s Step
description: Violent hungering energies erupt to consume your foes.

name: Mythical Amatok`s Step
description: "Blessed upon a frozen peak when Amatok`s star was visible in the night sky."

name: Mythical Windshear Greaves
description: You become like the wind, swift and difficult to pinpoint.

name: Mythical Wraithwalkers
description: You step through the veil to become like the dead, barely perceiving the physical realm around you.

name: Stormbearers
description: "The boots bore the full brunt of a lightning storm, and yet do not discharge completely into the earth beneath them."
